name: 7-minute HOP
description: Interesting jumping game with cute graphics and infinite gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 3.3 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 Gb Storage: 50 MB available space
